entities.name: wendelin the weird
entities.description: Wendelin is described as 'the Weird' which suggests she has some unusual or supernatural qualities.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as being careful not to be caught by the Dursleys while writing.

entities.name: dursley family
entities.description: The Dursley family is mentioned as a group of people who are Muggles and have a medieval attitude towards magic.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle and is described as part of the Dursley family.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt and is described as part of the Dursley family.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin and is described as being a Muggle with a medieval attitude towards magic.

relationships.description: Harry is related to the Dursley family, who are his only living relatives.
Harry is related to Uncle Vernon, who is part of the Dursley family.
Harry is related to Aunt Petunia, who is part of the Dursley family.
Harry is related to Dudley, who is his cousin and part of the Dursley family.
